SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class VerifyView

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.SignatureBaseView
uk.msci.project.rsa.VerifyView
public class VerifyView extends SignatureBaseView
The VerifyView class is responsible for managing the user interface related to the verification process in the Signature Scheme application.

    • addCancelImportSignatureButtonObserver

      public void addCancelImportSignatureButtonObserver(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> observer)
      Registers an observer for the cancelImportSignatureButton Button's action event. This observer is called when the user clicks the button to cancel the import of a text batch.
      Parameters:
      observer - The event handler to be registered.

    • addImportSigBatchButtonObserver

      public void addImportSigBatchButtonObserver(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> observer)
      Registers an observer for the importSigBatchButton Button's action event . This observer is invoked when the user clicks the button to import a batch of signatures.
      Parameters:
      observer - The event handler to be registered.

      observer - The event handler to be registered.
